Product Specification Brief:
Material: Composite of Portland cement, water, sand, and coarse aggregate.
Color: "Natural Grey." Custom colors available.
Attributes: Delivered un-cured. Specified by compressive strength (e.g., 3000 PSI).
Product Usage: Foundations, slabs, columns, beams, sidewalks, patios.
Trending Usages: Polished concrete floors, "board-formed" architectural walls, concrete countertops.
Sustainability Features: High thermal mass (regulates temperature), durable (long life), aggregates are locally sourced.
Portfolio Deliverables:
1. Mix Design Sheet
2. Strength Test Report
3. Project Case Study
Additional Details:
Warranty: Guaranteed to meet specified MPa/PSI strength.
Shelf Life: ~90 minutes (pot life).
Certifications: ASTM C94, ISO 9001.
Services: Pumping, color additives.
Alternative Vendors:
1. Jupiter Concrete (Germany)
2. Keystone Aggregates (USA)
3. Adani Concrete (India)

Product Specification Brief:
Material: Precast concrete elements (beams, columns) cast around a high-tensile steel rebar cage.
Color: "Off-White" or "Natural Grey."
Attributes: High structural load capacity (compressive and tensile).
Product Usage: Structural frames, high-rise buildings, bridges, foundations, retaining walls.
Trending Usages: Exposed structural elements (columns, soffits) as an interior aesthetic.
Sustainability Features: Durability (100+ year lifespan), thermal mass. Steel reinforcement has high recycled content and is 100% recyclable.
Portfolio Deliverables:
1. Structural Load Tables
2. CAD/BIM Models
3. Installation Guide
Additional Details:
Warranty: 10-Year Structural Warranty (precast).
Shelf Life: N/A (cured product).
Certifications: Local building code, ISO 14001.
Services: On-site engineering consultation.
Alternative Vendors:
1. Bedrock Precast (UK)
2. Sumitomo Structural (Japan)
3. Andrade Cimentos (Brazil)

Product Specification Brief:
Material: High-performance concrete mix, often with decorative aggregate, cast in custom molds.
Color: "Arctic White," "Deep Anthracite." Can mimic stone.
Attributes: Facade panels. Finishes: smooth, sandblasted, acid-etched.
Product Usage: Facade panels, wall systems, hollow-core floor slabs, stairs, stadium seating.
Trending Usages: Architectural facades with 3D shapes, insulated "sandwich" panels.
Sustainability Features: Reduced on-site waste, factory-controlled quality (less rework), thermal mass, durability.
Portfolio Deliverables:
1. Finish/Texture Catalog
2. CAD Connection Details
3. R-Value Data
Additional Details:
Warranty: 15-Year Finish & Structural Warranty.
Shelf Life: N/A.
Certifications: ACI 318, LEED documentation.
Services: Transport logistics, integrated insulation.
Alternative Vendors:
1. Polaris Facades (Canada)
2. Oryx Architectural (UAE)
3. Stellman Panels (Sweden)

Product Specification Brief:
Material: Lightweight foam concrete from quartz sand, lime, cement, and an aluminum expansion agent. Steam-cured.
Color: "Light Grey."
Attributes: Extremely lightweight, excellent thermal insulation.
Product Usage: Interior and exterior walls (load-bearing/non-load-bearing), partitions, firewalls.
Trending Usages: Used in high-performance "Green Buildings" for its high R-value in a single layer.
Sustainability Features: Excellent thermal insulation (reduces energy use), lightweight (less transport energy), non-toxic, cuttings are recycled.
Portfolio Deliverables:
1. Technical Data Sheet (TDS)
2. Fire Rating Certificate
3. Installation Manual
Additional Details:
Warranty: 5-Year Product Warranty.
Shelf Life: Indefinite (if stored dry).
Certifications: ASTM C1693.
Accessories: Thin-bed mortar, AAC saw.
Alternative Vendors:
1. Aeris Building Solutions (Poland)
2. Taurus Block (Turkey)
3. Dragon Lightweight (China)

Product Specification Brief:
Material: Fine powder (calcium silicates) that acts as a binder.
Color: Standard "Grey" or "White."
Attributes: Sold by type (Type I, Type III). Reacts with water (hydration) to set.
Product Usage: Binder for concrete, mortar, grout, and plaster.
Trending Usages: "Green Cement" (e.g., LC3) to reduce clinker content and carbon footprint.
Sustainability Features: Use of fly ash/slag as extenders (Supplementary Cementitious Materials) reduces carbon footprint.
Portfolio Deliverables:
1. Mill Test Report
2. Material Safety Data Sheet (MSDS)
3. Mix Design Guidelines
Additional Details:
Warranty: Guaranteed to meet specs at shipping.
Shelf Life: 3-6 months (in dry conditions).
Certifications: ASTM C150, EN 197-1.
Services: Bulk silo supply.
Alternative Vendors:
1. Obelisk Cement (Egypt)
2. Olympus Cements (Greece)
3. Fuji Cement (Japan)

Product Specification Brief:
Material: Pre-blended mix of cement (or lime), fine masonry sand, and admixtures.
Color: Standard "Grey." Also pre-pigmented colors.
Attributes: Specified by type (Type N, Type S).
Product Usage: Bonding masonry (bricks, blocks), plastering, tile bedding.
Trending Usages: Pre-mixed, polymer-modified mortars for high strength; colored mortars for design.
Sustainability Features: Lime-based mortars (vs. pure cement) are more "breathable," re-absorb CO2, and have lower embodied energy.
Portfolio Deliverables:
1. Technical Data Sheet (TDS)
2. Color Swatch Chart
3. Application Guide
Additional Details:
Warranty: 1-Year Product Warranty (unopened).
Shelf Life: 6-12 months (unopened, dry).
Certifications: ASTM C270.
Accessories: Waterproofing admixtures.
Alternative Vendors:
1. Redback Masonry (Australia)
2. Verdant Mortars (France)
3. Summit Mortar Co. (Canada)

Product Usage: Exterior siding (planks, panels), soffits, backer board for tile.
Trending Usages: Large-format panels for modern rainscreen facades; smooth finishes, dark colors.
Sustainability Features: Extremely durable (50+ year life), rot/pest/fire-resistant (low replacement), often contains recycled content.

Product Specification Brief:
Material: Coarse-grained igneous rock (quartz and feldspar).
Color: "Absolute Black," "Kashmir White," "Baltic Brown."
Attributes: Extremely hard, durable. Low porosity. Scratch/heat resistant.
Product Usage: Kitchen countertops, flooring, exterior cladding, paving.
Trending Usages: "Leathered" or "honed" (matte) finishes, "waterfall" island countertops.
Sustainability Features: Extremely durable (lasts centuries), inert, no VOCs. (High embodied energy from quarrying/transport).

Product Specification Brief:

Product Usage: Bathroom vanities, flooring, wall cladding (showers), fireplace surrounds.
Trending Usages: Heavily-veined varieties, "book-matched" slabs for feature walls, marble-clad furniture.
Sustainability Features: Durable, natural material, inert, no VOCs. (High embodied energy from quarrying/transport).

Product Specification Brief:

Sustainability Features: Extremely low embodied energy (if soil is from site), high thermal mass, biodegradable, non-toxic, regulates humidity.

Product Specification Brief:
Material: Annealed glass treated with high heat and rapid cooling.
Color: "Standard Clear" (green tint), "Low-Iron" (ultra-clear), "Frosted," "Tinted."
Attributes: 4-5x stronger than standard glass. Safety glass (shatters into pebbles).
Product Usage: Doors, shower enclosures, partitions, storefronts, railings.
Trending Usages: "Frameless" glass railings and shower doors, back-painted glass (splashbacks, wall-cladding).
Sustainability Features: Inert, 100% recyclable (though logistically difficult). (High embodied energy to produce).
Portfolio Deliverables:
1. Technical Data Sheet
2. Safety Certificate
3. Edgework Guide
Additional Details:
Warranty: 1-Year Manufacturer's Warranty.
Sizing: Custom-cut; Thickness (e.g., 6mm, 10mm).
Shelf Life: N/A.
Certifications: ANSI Z97.1, CPSC 16 CFR 1201.
Services: Custom edgework, hole drilling.
Alternative Vendors:
1. Flemish Glassworks (Belgium)
2. Kronos Safety Glass (Germany)
3. Allegheny Glass (USA)

Product Specification Brief:
Material: Sandwich of two+ glass layers bonded with a plastic interlayer (PVB).
Color: "Clear." Interlayer can be "White Translucent."
Attributes: Safety glass (fragments stick to interlayer).
Product Usage: Skylights, storefronts, railings, car windshields, overhead glazing.
Trending Usages: "Acoustic" laminated glass for soundproofing, "Hurricane" or "Security" glass.
Sustainability Features: Durable, long life, provides sound insulation. (Recyclable, but difficult due to interlayer).
Portfolio Deliverables:
1. TDS (impact, acoustic)
2. Safety Certificate
3. Interlayer Options
Additional Details:
Warranty: 5-Year Warranty (against delamination).
Sizing: Custom-cut; various interlayer thicknesses.
Shelf Life: N/A.
Certifications: ANSI Z97.1, SGC.
Services: Bullet-resistant options.
Alternative Vendors:
1. Louvre Glass (France)
2. Liberty Safety Glass (USA)
3. Sakura Glass (Japan)

Product Specification Brief:
Material: Two halves of pressed glass fused together, creating a hollow block.
Color: "Clear," "Frosted," or colors (Blue, Green) cast into the glass.
Attributes: Allows light with privacy. Good thermal/acoustic insulation.
Product Usage: Partition walls, shower walls, windows (where privacy + light is needed).
Trending Usages: Comeback in "retro" designs, exterior feature walls, use of new shapes/finishes.
Sustainability Features: Good thermal & acoustic insulation, durable, inert, 100% recyclable.

2. Installation Guide

Product Specification Brief:
Material: Polyvinyl Chloride, a rigid thermoplastic.
Color: "White" (Sch 40 plumbing) or "Grey" (Sch 80 industrial).
Attributes: Lightweight, rigid, low-cost. Does not corrode.
Product Usage: Plumbing (drain, waste, vent), water mains, electrical conduit.
Trending Usages: Cellular PVC trim (wood replacement) for exterior use (non-structural).
Sustainability Features: Durable (long life, no corrosion). (Petroleum-based, creates dioxins when burned, difficult to recycle).
Portfolio Deliverables:
1. TDS (pressure, temp rating)
2. Chemical Resistance Chart
3. Installation Manual
Additional Details:

Sizing: Schedule 40, Schedule 80; Diameters (1/2" to 12").
Shelf Life: N/A (protect from UV).
Certifications: NSF/ANSI 61.
Accessories: Fittings, primer, cement.

Product Specification Brief:
Material: A strong, transparent thermoplastic.
Color: "Clear" (like glass), "Opal" (translucent white), "Bronze" (tinted).
Attributes: 250x more impact-resistant than glass ("shatterproof"). Lightweight.
Product Usage: Skylights, canopies, greenhouse glazing, signage.
Trending Usages: Multi-wall panels used as translucent interior/exterior walls for a diffused light effect.
Sustainability Features: Lightweight (low transport energy), durable, high light transmission. (Petroleum-based, not easily recycled).

2. Installation Guide
3. Fire Rating Sheet

Product Specification Brief:
Material: Gypsum plaster core pressed between two sheets of paper.
Color: "Manila" or "White" face paper. "Green" (mold-resistant), "Purple" (high mold/impact).
Attributes: Standard for interior walls/ceilings. 1/2" (standard) or 5/8" Type X (fire-rated).
Product Usage: Interior walls and ceilings.
Trending Usages: "Level 5" (ultra-smooth) finish, sound-dampening drywall, glass-mat (mold-proof) drywall.
Sustainability Features: Gypsum is a natural, inert material. Face paper is recycled paper. Can be recycled (though often landfilled).
Portfolio Deliverables:
1. Technical Data Sheet
2. Fire Rated Assembly Guide
3. MSDS
Additional Details:
Warranty: 1-Year Limited Warranty.
Sizing: 1.2x2.4m (4x8ft), 1.2x3.6m (4x12ft); Thickness (1/2", 5/8").
Shelf Life: Indefinite (if kept dry/flat).
Certifications: ASTM C1396.
Accessories: Mold-resistant, fire-rated (Type X).

Product Specification Brief:
Material: Gypsum-based (standard), lime-based (traditional), or cement-based.
Color: "Off-White" (to be painted). Decorative plasters are color-integrated.
Attributes: Applied wet. Creates a hard, seamless finish.
Product Usage: Interior wall/ceiling finish (over lath or blue-board), decorative finishes.
Trending Usages: "Venetian" (polished) plaster, "Tadelakt" (Moroccan waterproof), "Clay" plaster (natural/eco-friendly).
Sustainability Features: Lime and clay plasters are natural, "breathable" (regulate humidity), non-toxic (no VOCs), and have low embodied energy.
Portfolio Deliverables:
1. Technical Data Sheet
2. Application Instructions
3. Finish Texture Gallery
